TopicTitle: Space Engine - Planet of the Idiots

Articles.Content:
I thought I\'d share, as I\'ve done with a few other videos of mine here:

[Space Engine - The Planet of the Idiots](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qY8xjOHwieo#ws)

I also am sort of moving into this type of video, with the spoken stuff, rather than just music. Good idea/bad idea? If the latter, any tips going forward?

> 
> That was just amazing.

I second that.

Have you seen the Sagan series? 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/oY59wZdCDo0?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

At one point there was lag in game engine. (or just my internet...)

Other than that the video was great.

Also how do you get space engine? I\'m in the US and it takes about 3 hours to download from Russia...

Didn\'t you make another one of these and posted it in General Discussion?

They\'re both really good, and I\'ve finally nailed it.

The narration is completely reminiscent of the intro to \'Twilight Zone\'

It was a pretty good video

BTW the same guy who did the Sagan series also did a series based off Richard Feynman\'s interviews?.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cRmbwczTC6E?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> Didn\'t you make another one of these and posted it in General Discussion?
> 
> They\'re both really good, and I\'ve finally nailed it.
> 
> The narration is completely reminiscent of the intro to \'Twilight Zone\'
> 
> It was a pretty good video

Yeah, I often post my stuff here for suggestions and opinions since it\'s space related.

Yes, Doctor, I\'ve seen both series, and they\'re amazing. In fact, they\'re why I tried to make that type of video in Space Engine.

> 
> At one point there was lag in game engine. (or just my internet...)
> 
> Other than that the video was great.
> 
> Also how do you get space engine? I\'m in the US and it takes about 3 hours to download from Russia...

That was some lag on my part. I did some cutting that removed some of it, but to get all of it would have just been really tedious.

I got it from those links on the site a while ago, I\'m not sure what the problem would be there, sorry.
That was awesome!!! Carl Sagan is the best! And you, are awesome for doing that with Space Engine!

Brilliant, just brilliant. 

Funniest thing about it, related video = Why Christians think aliens are demons 4/5
